name: Garden Blossom Jam
description:
Garden Blossom Jam is new and exciting game from a team of top hit game app makers. It is an addictive mania match 3 and match 4 game! Blast the blossom flower buds after line them up and enjoy the very addictive splash and most interesting match-three casual puzzle game!
- Here are our favorite flowers.
- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master.
- Here we can collect a lot of eggs.
- There are a lot of small bees and birds hard in this flower field.
- This is a beautiful garden.
